          <title>
            <string language="en">Macromolecules in living organism</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Makromoleküle in lebendem Organismus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Macromolécules dans l'organization vivante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Macromolecules em organismo vivo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Macromolecole nell'organismo vivente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μακρομόρια στον οργανισμό διαβίωσης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Macromoléculas en organismo vivo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows the three types of macromolecules: polysaccharides, proteins, nucleic acids and their corresponding subunits.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">amino acid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">macromolecules</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="en">subunit</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt die drei Typen der 
Makromoleküle: Polysaccharide, Proteine, Nukleinsäuren und 
ihre entsprechenden Untereinheiten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre les trois types de 
macromolécules : polysaccharides, protéines, acides 
nucléiques et leurs sous-unités correspondantes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra os três tipos de 
macromolecules: polysaccharides, proteínas, ácidos nucleic e 
seus subunits correspondentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra i tre tipi di macromolecole:
polisaccaridi, proteine, acidi nucleici e le loro unità 
secondarie corrispondenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει τρεις τύπους μακρομορίων:
πολυσακχαρίτες, πρωτεϊ'νες, νουκλεϊνικά οξέα και οι 
αντίστοιχες υπομονάδες τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra los tres tipos de 
macromoléculas: polisacáridos, proteínas, ácidos nucleic y 
sus subunidades correspondientes.</string>
          </description>
